### Simulate data

```{r}
npred = 50
nobs  = 1000
betas = rnorm(npred)
sresid= 0.1

x     = matrix(rnorm(npred * nobs), nrow = nobs)
y     = x %*% betas + rnorm(nobs, sd = sresid)

```
